§◉§8§lControl Time GUI!

§1Stop Time - stops all entities from moving, crops from growing, time of day remains the same, mob events disabled.

§2Resume Time - the time becomes normal again!

§0Pause Game - same as "§1Stop Time§0", but all players are frozen as well!

§6Slow Time - reduces normal speed by 10x!

§cSpeed Up - increases normal speed by 10x!

§8Settings - change default settings of this addon. Use "§3/tag @s admin§8" in order to be able to access settings!

commands: tellraw @initiator[tag=!admin] {"rawtext":[{"text":"§c§lError:§r§c Only Admins can access settings!"}]}

§◉§8§lControl Time SETTINGS!

§0Toggle Text:
- Enable Actionbar (default)
- Disable Actionbar 

Toggle Sound: 
- ZA WARUDO (default)
- Beacon Sound
- No Sounds

Toggle Players
when time is stopped:
- All Players Freeze
- All Players, except Admins Freeze
- Players do not freeze (default)
